data.title: International Ballet Competition
data.meta_description: Jurors for the 2018 USA International Ballet Competition will be announced in late 2017 or early 2018. Members of the jury panels for each of the 10 previous USA International Ballet Competitions are listed here.
data.text:
The Jury is comprised of dance dignitaries with impressive careers as professional ballet dancers, artistic directors, and notable ballet instructors. Between 9-12 exemplary candidates are chosen to represent their country and evaluate the incredibly talented competitors.

Members of the jury panels for each of the 12 previous USA International Ballet Competitions are listed here.

USA IBC XII, 2023

John Meehan, Chairman; Paloma Herrera, Argentina; Robert Curran (Round 1 & 2), Stanton Welch (Round 3), Australia; André Lewis, Canada; Feng Ying, China; Frank Andersen, Denmark; Angel Corella, Spain; Ashley Wheater, United Kingdom; Lauren Anderson, United States

USA IBC XI, 2018

John Meehan, Chairman, USA; Stanton Welch, Australia; André Lewis, Canada; Feng Ying, China; Xiomara Reyes, Cuba; Hae Shik Kim, Korea; Gennadi Nedvigin, Russia; Trinidad Vives, Spain; Vadim Pisarev, Ukraine; Ashley Wheater, United Kingdom

USA IBC X, 2014

Edward Villella, Chairman, USA; Nina Ananiashvili, Georgia; Alexei Fadeechev, Russia; Hideo Fukagawa, Japan; Gigi Hyatt, Germany; Hae Shik Kim, South Korea; Andre Lewis, Canada; John Meehan, Australia; Trinidad Vives, Spain; Ashley Wheater, United Kingdom; Feng Ying, China

USA IBC IX, 2010

Bruce Marks, Chairman, USA; Alexei Ratmansky, Russia; Denise Schultze, South Africa; John Meehan, Australia; Hae Shik Kim, South Korea; Lita Beiris, Latvia; Bruce Simpson, Great Britain; Xiao Susha, China; Thomas Lund, Denmark; Hideo Fukagawa, Japan; Samantha Dunster, Canada; Doris Laine, Finland; Trinidad Vives, Spain
